text: How strongly do you agree that Spotify's interface enables you to quickly add songs to a new playlist?
If you have any additional comments about the Spotify playlist creation interface, please leave them below.
answers: I like how the suggeted songs automatically change as you put songs into the playlist but wish there was a way to specify genery or activity to help better curate the suggested songs.
No preview option when searching for song during the playlist creation process. It becomes a problem when too many songs have the same title.
It takes too many clicks to add a song to a playlist. I have to search it, sometimes filter by just "songs" to find it in the list, right click, select Add, then select the playlist itself.
